title: Jack Todd: Silver linings for Canadiens after rough outing in Boston
author: Jack Todd
blurb: While Cayden Primeau struggled and Montreal was outmuscled, Lane Hutson dazzled and Brendan Gallagher, Joel Armia and Josh Anderson played well.

title: Old Montreal fire: Two men, 18 and 20, arrested in connection with deadly Oct. 4 blaze
author: Jacob Serebrin, Leora Schertzer
blurb: The five-alarm fire took the lives of French tourists Léonor Geraudie, 43, and her seven-year-old daughter, Vérane Reynaud-Geraudie.

title: Pat Hickey: Reasons to believe Habs will be a 90-point team this season
author: Pat Hickey
blurb: A clearer picture in goal, Lane Hutson's electric skill-set and the addition (when he's healthy) of Patrik Laine should all be a boost.

title: Longueuil woman arrested again after Black child, 10, scalded with boiling water
author: Paul Cherry
blurb: The re-arrest of Stéphanie Borel, 46, comes after complaints from a lobby group that fights racism and discrimination.

title: What's open and closed on Thanksgiving Monday in Montreal
author: Montreal Gazette
blurb: Société de transport de Montréal buses will run on a modified schedule, while Longueuil's RTL and Laval's STL will have Saturday schedules.
